original_title: 呪霊映像 放送出来ない投稿動画4
overview: Many ghost images have been posted on "Horror Story of a Million People", which is attracting attention as a post-type ghost story collection site even today... The resentments, regrets, sorrows, and fears of the grudges may be manifesting themselves there. The video posted here is so shocking that even TV stations are reluctant to broadcast it.
title: Curse Video: Posted Video That Cannot be Broadcast 4
